tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am sharing my review almost 11 months late. The care my wife received from Dr. Ramapraba during her maternity period was exceptional. She is very understandable and tends to observe/hear what her patients are thinking. As a well-matured professional, she can take correct decisions on time. The level of patience she exhibits is greatly appreciated.Here's a wonderful moment I'd like to share with you. A baby's birth is one of the most precious events in a person's life. One day after the delivery, Doctor cut cake at the hospital to celebrate this occasion. It was a new experience and much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have been visiting Dr. Ramaprabha with my wife from the early stages of her pregnancy. We have found Dr. Ramaprabha's consultations extremely satisfactory. Her consultations are amply detailed, transparent, helpful and affordable. We highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: ************ ** *** ** *** **** ****** *** ********** She understands our problems, anxiety and fears and provides solutions and counseling. Inspite of having complications, I was able to deliver a baby boy in normal delivery is purely because of her motivation and patience.  I am blessed to meet such a caring doctor like her and I would recommend her to all the women out there, you can trust her without a second thought. She will make sure that u and ur baby are safe.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe utreus and endometriosis problem. We consulted doctor. She explained us very clearly about the issue. She gave confidence and support. Hysterectomy were done. Dr.Ramaprabha is such a kind, patient friendly, easily approachable, bold in nature.  Thanks God to show such a doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Excellent human being to understand the importance and respect of each patient. Very well coordinated and done TOTAL LAPROSCOPIC HYSTERECTOMY surgery for my 67 years old mother in law.  My MIL had many challenges in her body due to huge fibroids for past 10 years. It's really a God's gift that we came to know about Dr. Ramapraba Madam. She took care of each and every concern we said. Now my MIL is completely fine. Thanks a lot Dr. for everything.
reply_text: Thank u so much for your valuable feedback ..Thanks for believing in our team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went through uterus removal surgery with Doctor Ramapraba.   She is not only professional also very friendly and caring.   Even though my health condition was more complicated than expected during the surgery,   Ramapraba and her team handled it very professionally and made me feel so simple and easy.  She is an awesome person.   I strongly recommend Doctor Ramapraba.

review: I am not a person who writes reviews.But this is for Dr.Ramaprabha.I am new in Chennai and due to mistake of previous doctor all of sudden I got blood clots.As it was Sunday there was no one available.We had video meeting and she understood the seriousness of problem. She called me in emergency and came for me to the hospital on sunday.She gave correct treatment and also followed up with me.After a week when the problem was not solved she did necessary treatment.I would definitely recommend her not just for the treatment but how nicely she explained the problem and took care of me at right time which is expected from doctors.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback..

review: Hi this is Megala Kirupakaran. When the first time I was at the hospital the doctor and staffs are very kind and friendly and explain about treatment and exercise and also the food diet. I was impressed with doctor speech she is name was Dr. RAMAPRABHA. My delivery date was September 5 2020. I was very fear to face my Delivery. When I was admitted in the hospital. She trying to Normal delivery. and the baby weight 4kg. Thanks to Dr. RAMAPRABHA mam. She was very to handle in that situation. and also thanks to Hospital nurse all are kind and friendly. Thank you to the whole team.
reply_text: We are happy that we as a team have taken care of your family and we are always committed for excellence... Thank you for your review

review:
it was my first experience for online video consultation. Dr was not available on video and we had an audio call. Doctor is good but Practo needs to improve on logistics.  I was called by doctor for physical meeting and was charged again. Since dr is nearby, a physical visit in first attempt would have been more economical for me. Practo should consider this feedback.
For Doctor,  she is good and I am happy so far. I would know better after few weeks on results of treatment.
